summary:
Not afraid to get into trenches with the team. Try to understand the problem before pitching a solution. Getting the best out of those around me, with a track record of creating thriving team environments.

ğ’ğ­ğ«ğšğ­ğğ ğ¢ğœ. Taking a step back to look at the longer term horizons. Work with teams to formulate the actions we need to achieve that longer term ambition. Able to be brutally honest with myself and those around me to pull us back on track.

ğ“ğğšğ¦.  Making sure the team around me is working together. Not afraid to seek advice and hire those that make my feel embarrassed.  Ensuring that we all get the best out of each other within a safe working environment. 

ğƒğ¨ğğ«. Get your hands dirty, work directly with your teams. Test, code, deploy and donâ€™t be afraid to look silly (yes, my coding is horrible at best) to pitch in when times are tough.

'description': 'Small company for side projects.  Some future side projects will include:

Freelancing contracts with:
- CarNext (Head of Cloud & Platform Engineering)
- UPC Switzerland (Digital Transformation)
- Liberty Global (Product & agile)
- ACN (Java CRM Build)
 

Side Projects:
Captr.nl. 
- Write iOS application for sharing photos in groups - privately
- Application was built on top of firebase - somewhat of a steep learning curve getting to understand 
ExpenseView
- Small application that takes different file formats (pdf, csv, etc) and creates a categorised financial overview
- Locally written using python, Flask, SQLite, docker and deployed on ubuntu', 'title': 'Owner/Founder', 'employment_type': 'Part-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 18933937, 'name': 'CarNext.com', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQGLIT4KHvdXww/company-logo_400_400/0/1645091436565?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=dzr8q-vCD4KWnGGuQLSn_NeOxB-TZ5RQJBRRy4hhu-g', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/carnextcom/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'CarNext.com', 'description': 'Carnext is a second hand digital marketplace within Europe.

- Create a strategy for Developer Experience and tooling to help make their lives easier
- Created the first draft for career & learning paths - focusing on long term retention of developers within the organisation
- Reshape the platform team, including hiring of new people to complement established team
- Moved off of cloudformation and write all new services with Terraform (with the team)
- Help to design an appropriate landingZone and working organisations for AWS 
- Helped shape the roadmap for the team which including reaching out to the developers in other areas and figure out how to improve their experience.
- Worked on building a cohesive team spirit and ownership', 'title': 'Head of Cloud Engineering & Platform', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 6130, 'name': 'VEON', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFUwB5nJwqJjg/company-logo_400_400/0/1655808125989?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=sKF0prW0HppMjWi18gmXlVHd3E6FyS5mtnwPZmyHTwA', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/veon/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'VEON', 'description': 'At VEON we deployed a single multi-tennant app that was built and rolled out to 13 different Operating Countries. This was done with a small but talented team of software engineers and product managers. The goal was to increate the Digital footprint and explore new verticals within telecoms and increase customer happiness. 

- Moved the teams from being horizontal focused to being product and vertically aligned.
- Pushed ownership and autonomy into the teams and moved away from centralised ownership. 
- Introduced cross-functional planning (aka. Big room planning) to help align the different dependancies on the teams. This was then used to figure out how to reduce dependancies
- Increase test coverage from approximately 35% to 72% 
- Reduce costs on AWS after the first year of bill shock. Reduced spending by 35% second year
- Managed 4 separate teams. Promoted tech leads to each team and provided support for them.
- Responsible for CAPEX & OPEX budgets for the digital engineering teams


Technologies used:
- AWS as cloud 
- Scala for All backend work
- Python for data science
- Go for writing our own container platform 
- Swift & ObjC for iOS
- Kotlin and JavaRX for android', 'title': 'Director Of Technical Operations', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 2645, 'name': 'Liberty Global', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQENFprSrRgA3g/company-logo_400_400/0/1691575653480?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=occHktVOVZnTkqcegizwCVlC-D2Cmlp38eWJSnJGoMY', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/liberty-global/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Schiphol-Rijk, The Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'Liberty Global', 'description': '- Take over leadership of the agile and product ownership in Technology and Innovation (Digital Unit)
- Pitch to change processes in regards to software engineering - moving away from Big Bang approach to smaller iterations 
- Continue to support with the agile transformation across all engineering teams, focusing on getting teams to work with small iterations released often.
- Responsible for CAPEX spending, hiring new talent and building team culture.', 'title': 'Manager of Agile & Product ', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}, {'location': 'Schiphol-Rijk, The Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'Liberty Global', 'description': "- Product Lead for MVNO integration between UPC and Ziggo
- Help to further roll out LG's Scrum at Scale methodology to their platform teams
- Focus on establishing a product ownership organisation
- Responsible for hiring of product owners within the different areas of Technology.", 'title': 'Team Lead - Product Owners  (Freelance Role)', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 15231905, 'name': 'Pareteum Corporation | Nasdaq: TEUM', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQH3Qpa8Ra5ybg/company-logo_400_400/0/1519903916554?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=SSzBhy_C8-q6LUtPXmq02dw7Yc6aDmRNGkIyZMpuYuU', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/pareteum-mvne/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'Pareteum MVNE (a Circles company)', 'description': "-  Working with MVNO's on feasibility of new product's being brought into the market.
